page.title: 14YOUTH ACTIVITIES
page.content: In Toft and Comberton many discos are held all through the year.Usually the Meridian Primary School, has a disco once or twice a year,in the school hall. For the older children there was a youth club at the Village College.At the youth club they sometimes hold discos.At discos they sell sweets, chocolates and drinks. The tickets for a disco usually cost about 75p. For birthdays or partys you can hire the village hall and also disc jockeys to play the records for you. A 4th year privilege at the end of the term is to have a disco in the school hall but this year (1985) the 4th years watched a video of SUPERMAN III but the 3rd years and some 2nd years watched it as well!
